CustomField.description: Emergency care medical provider instructed patient to receive during Virtual Visit
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Veterans Crisis Line connects Veterans, Service members and their loved ones in crisis with qualified, caring VA responders through a confidential toll-free hotline, online chat, or text 24/7. Contact the Veterans Crisis Line: Dial 988 then Press 1, chat online, or text 838255.
CustomField.label: Provided Info for Veteran Crisis Line
